text: Sagay Broadcasting Corporation is a Philippine radio network. Its main headquarters are located at 2/F, La Castill Bldg., Magsaysay St., Brgy. Zone 1, Digos. SBC operates a number of stations across the country under the Muews Radio brand.Republic Act No. 8099Radio broadcaster in Davao del Sur faces 255 counts of libelBrodkaster gibatikos sa netizens ==Stations== ===Muews Radio=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
